intent_template: The person in the video {description}. Can you take me to the search page for {request}?
intent: The person in the video states they want protein powder because they play a certain sport. Can you take me to the search page for shoes for that sport, using the search term '{sport mentioned} shoes'?
intermediate_intent: What was the sport mentioned by the person in the video?

instantiation_dict.description: states they want protein powder because they play a certain sport
instantiation_dict.request: shoes for that sport, using the search term '{sport mentioned} shoes'
